snippet: In the belief that it ought to appear as if someone cared about the city’s second-most-prominent 9/11 memorial — the “Sphere for Plaza Fountain” sculpture — a guerrilla cleaning crew took matters into its own hands.
abstract: In the belief that it ought to appear as if someone cared about the city’s second-most-prominent 9/11 memorial — the “Sphere for Plaza Fountain” sculpture — a guerrilla cleaning crew took matters into its own hands.

headline.main: As 9/11 Anniversary Nears, Guerrilla Cleaners Scrub the 'Sphere' Memorial
headline.print_headline: Sculpture From World Trade Center Gets a Bath but Needs a Home

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
